title: Dwayne Johnson
summary: Dwayne Douglas Johnson (born May 2, 1972), also known by his ring name The Rock,[4] is an American actor, businessman, and former professional wrestler.[7][8] Regarded as one of the greatest professional wrestlers of all time,[9][10] he wrestled for WWE for eight years prior to pursuing an acting career. His films have grossed over $3.5 billion in North America and over $10.5 billion worldwide,[11] making him one of the world's highest-grossing and highest-paid actors.[12][13]
